Hi, I'm Chris Lessard

See my:

  • work
  • writing
  • resume

I'm a third year student at the University of Toronto pursuing my B.Sc. in Computer Science. I'm a developer and a tech enthusiast, with long running interests in the media, art, music and education.

I was born in Ottawa, having since moved to Toronto for school. I currently work as an intern at Canada's National Research Council, and as an editor for RUCS, a publication of the best undergraduate research in Computer Science done at the University of Toronto.

Python is my favorite programming language, and Arch Linux is my OS of choice. I sometimes write music reviews with my friends (link soon), and spend too much of my free time watching this guy.
